title: 16A.1286 STATEWIDE SYSTEMS ACCOUNT.
text:
The statewide systems account is a separate account in the special revenue fund. All money resulting from billings for statewide systems services must be deposited in the account. For the purposes of this section, statewide systems includes the state accounting system, payroll system, human resources systems, procurement system, and related information access systems.
The commissioner may bill each fiscal year for statewide systems services provided to state agencies in the executive, legislative, and judicial branches, the Minnesota State Colleges and Universities, and other entities. Each entity shall be billed based on that entity's usage of the statewide systems. Each agency shall transfer from agency operating appropriations to the statewide systems account the amount billed by the commissioner. The commissioner shall develop billing policies and procedures.
[See Note.]
Money transferred into the account is appropriated to the commissioner to pay for statewide systems services.
[Repealed, 2002 c 379 art 1 s 114]
[Repealed, 2002 c 379 art 1 s 114]
